version_description: Minor bug fixed.
Minor bug fixed.
本格MMORPG「VENDETTA（ヴェンデッタ）」

[Update Details]
- Added Guild Occupy
- Added Daily Achievements
- Improved Deathmatch Matchmaking
- Improved Field Raid
- Added Targeting System
- Added Ranking System
- Improved Occupy
- New Costumes
- Bug Fixes
Some bug fixes

[Updates]
- Added Guild Raid
- Added Guild Domain
- Added Hall of Heroes
- Added Alliance Recommendation
- Changed Lobby Theme
- Bug Fixes

Update Details
-Magic Symbol Added
-Shard Exchange Added
-Name Change System Added
-Maid Costume Added
-Improvement & Bug Fix

Updates
-Fixed an issue that control button overlaps with the enemy user target UI on Ipad

Update detail
- Client freezing issue fixed (occurred intermittently when playing Occupy)

Update Details
- 2nd update for Hall of Heroes
- NEW: Valentine's Day Costumes
- NEW: Valentine's Day Event (2/8~)
- Other improvements & bug fixes

Updates
- New Area: Zairon
- New Monsters
- Animal Costumes
- Bug Fixes

[Updates]
- ULTRAMAN Collaboration Event
- New Alliance Raid
- Adjusted Status Balance
- Improved Equipment Enhancement and Limit Break

1. ‘Gob’s Vault’ updated
2. New Costume ‘Police’ added
3. Alliance Raid Reward Rule changed
4. Emotional Expression system added
5. Bug Fix

* Targeting improvement
* Bug fixes

[Relic] Fixed an error where the identical pop-up message was shown twice when the Open button was tapped multiple times
Fixed an error where the rewards were not shown when opening Gob's Relic
Fixed an error where the sound kept playing when a certain action is carried out by the user in Major Clash result screen
Combat Powers will no longer be shown while loading for Team Battle - will only show allies' Combat Power

2.3.00 Update Details
* 15 New Magic Symbols
* Added Magic Symbol Slots and Pins
* New: Harvest Special Event
* New Set of Wings and a Ride
* Server Stabilization

2.3.10 Update Details
* Fixed various bugs.

2.4.00 Update Details
* Added Jewel Slots for Accessories
* New Costumes
* New Guardian Fairy
* Special Halloween Drop Event
* Improved Level-up Speed
* Improved Deathmatch (Removed Alliance vs. Alliance Mode)
* Improved Character Balance
* More Dungeons Clearable With Quick Clear Tickets

2.5.10 Update Details
* New Wing Grades and More Wing Effects
* New Costumes and Weapon Costumes
* RvR Improvements

2.5.20 Update Details
* Fixed a display error found in Wings and Guardian Fairies
* Improved RvR rewards
* Updated Guild Raid rewards
* Various bug fixes

2.6.00 Update Details
* Mythical+ Armor: More superior and powerful version of Mythical equipment!
Added exclusive set skill for Mythical+ Armor

* Great Gate Season 2
Devise diverse strategies to defeat the upgraded boss!

* New Holiday Costumes & Ride
Check out exclusive Costumes and Ride for this holiday season!

* Various bug fixes

2.6.10 Update Details
* Fixed an error that caused the game to be disconnected from servers when launching Expedition on cleared floors in the Maze of the Labyrinth.
* Fixed an error that caused the Raid Dungeon Boss’s Evasion to be unusually high.

2.7.00 Update Details
* Improvements to Golem Research Facility
* Improvements to Attendance Calendar
* New Mode: Dueling Grounds
* New 1 vs. 1 Mode (Field)
* New Costumes & Ride

2.7.10 Update Details
* Fixed a bug that caused Pell to become transparent
* Fixed a bug that occurred when using Quick Clear Ticket
* Fixed other miscellaneous bugs

v2.8.30 Update Details
* Improved Mythical+ Equipment
You may now exchange your Mythical+ Equipment for different Mythical+ Equipment!
* Added Weapon Costume Shards to Exchange
* Added New Costumes
New Costumes have been added in celebration of Valentine's Day!

v2.9.00 Update Details
* Updated with 8 Classes!
8 new Classes for all four characters
* New emoticon system
Express yourself with a tap!
* Added Passive Cards
Use Passive Cards to get stronger!
* New Cave of Ordeals difficulty
Take on new difficulties! Devise a winning strategy and go for the top prizes!
